message.body: O Thai!
Hai*
Best day ever! We can double text!
Haha true :)
How is it going though???
On my way to a few places!
Great! I'm doing well, there are some cool people here.
change of plans for tonight, can you meet me for dinner with Edgar and his gf at 7?
Yea I can do that!
ck it in with Edgar haha
Ck? Man this is still stressful
Looked at a 4 person and then a 2
The 2 was way too ritzy
The 4 had reallyyy sloping ceilings in the attic rooms. Bummer.
Great! So the thing with Russ fell through because the 4 BR place got taken and they are going to look at 3BR places. So I'm basically going to try to lo
Oh my goodness, NO! that got cut off. What are you trying to look at?
We are gonna look at 3 BR places tomorrow
And I just found out Ireland is out
Ah ok! I hope that works out. Are we still meeting up with Edgar?
But that I will be on Crico, which is in Cambridge (Boston) so that's a good thing!!
Yes we are def meeting Edgar. I mean if you can't make it, nbd, but it would be great if you can
I'll try! We are making lots of appointments...definitely through 3:30 at least
Mmk well I'll let you know where we end up bit it will probably be near the park st stop
Ok that is reasonable!
Yea! You gotta head back here anyways :) did you see then part where I was like, I'm gonna be in Boston after vacation?
Right. Oh I didn't! Oh wow, so for all of august! But are you still gonna try to sign sept 1 or do the guys want aug?
Just saw a place I LOVED
Great! Take it! Where is it? Um, still trying to sign in sept, I'll just be traveling for July and august, which will be good I think :)
My phone is gonna die! Where should we meet and what time? I'll be done in like an hour
